snippet: Recipes from the tech world, in Bits.
abstract: Recipes from the tech world, in Bits.
lead_paragraph: Over on our sister blog, Bits, comes news that some of the best minds in technology also have a knack for cooking and baking. Our colleague Claire Cain Miller writes that a new cookbook, “The Start-Up Chef,” will be released today, featuring 75 recipes by tech entrepreneurs, engineers and executives. We can’t wait to try Ken Weber of Zynga’s halibut with Meyer lemon salsa.
